named-native-query.name: Local.buscar
named-native-query.query: select * from public.local loc where (cast(?1 as varchar) is null or loc.codigo = to_number(cast(?1 as varchar), '999999999')) and (cast(?2 as varchar) is null or upper(loc.nome) like upper('%' || cast(?2 as varchar) || '%')) order by loc.nome
